Package it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AlreadyInsidePlayerException
    This exception is raised when an attempt to add a Player to a full Match is made.
    BadCommandException
    This exception is raised the user types a malformed command in CLI.
    CannotIncreaseLevelException
    This exception is raised when a Worker tries to build to a Cell which is already at the Dome level.
    CellNotEmptyException
    This exception is raised when an action on a Cell which is not empty is attempted.
    InvalidCellException
    This exception is raised when an action on a Cell which is not valid is attempted.
    InvalidColorException
    This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a PrintableColor which is not valid, because its String representation is not recognized, or because that PrintableColor has already been chosen.
    InvalidGodException
    This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a GodStrategy which is not valid or because that GodStrategy has already been chosen, or it's not selectable for this match.
    InvalidPlayerNumberException
    This exception is raised when a client sends an invalid player number in the initial phase of the connection.
    NicknameAlreadyTakenException
    This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a nickname which is not valid because that nickname has already been chosen.
    UnknownGodException
    This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a GodStrategy which is not valid or because that GodStrategy has a String representation which cannot be recognized as valid.
    WrongGamePhaseException
    This exception is raised the a client sends a Command which is not performable in the current GamePhase of this match.
    WrongPlayerException
    This exception is raised the a Player sends a Command when it's not its turn.
